A golden rule of the wife: There isn't a problem in the world that couldn't be created.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
My husband and I had very happy twenty years. After that we met.
When I see lovers' names carved in a tree, I don't think it's sweet. I just think it's surprising how many people bring a knife on a date.
My old aunts would come and tease me at weddings, 'Well Maya? Do you think you will be next?' We settled this quickly once I started doing the same to them at funerals.
